medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began recently with worsening lower abdominal pain, primarily in the left lower quadrant greater than right. The patient also reported some loose stools alternating with constipation, most recently loose.
medical_history.past_medical_history: T2DM, COPD, obesity, MALT lymphoma, IBS.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had breast cancer. One sister had lymphoma, another sister had brain cancer, and a half brother had brain cancer.
